amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce energy efficiency and renewable energy funds by $26,510,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce energy efficiency and renewable energy funds by $26,510,000 and increase the spending reduction account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 292 (Roll no. 545).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 292 (Roll no. 545).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
